control.name: lsStyles
control.description: You can apply style schemes to a Vertical Grid either via the 'Styles Scheme Page' at design time or via the LoadScheme method in code.

control.name: tabPage10
control.description: On this tab you can click any item within the ListBoxControl related with the corresponding Vertical Grid's UI element and modify its appearance settings via the PropertyGridControl. The Vertical Grid's appearance settings are stored in the Appearance collection.
